sentences.en: a garden rake
sentences.cn: 园艺耙

sentences.en: As long as you can rake more in, you can stand anything.
sentences.cn: 只要多进钱, 什么也得受着!

sentences.en: He is a notorious rake.
sentences.cn: 他是个声名狼藉的浪子.

sentences.en: He would rake the soil gently and water the flowers.
sentences.cn: 他会轻轻翻土,浇花的.

sentences.en: I have no desire to rake over the past.
sentences.cn: 我不想旧事重提。

sentences.en: I was not a rake, but I assure you I have reformed.
sentences.cn: 我还不至于是个浪子, 但是我可以肯定地告诉你我已经回头了.

sentences.en: I watched the men rake leaves into heaps.
sentences.cn: 我看着那些人把叶子耙成堆。

sentences.en: In the autumn I rake up the dead leaves.
sentences.cn: 秋天我把死叶耙拢.

sentences.en: In the spring I use the rake to make a good seed bed.
sentences.cn: 春天我用耧耙耘好地作好苗床.

sentences.en: Nobody wanted to rake over his past history.
sentences.cn: 没人愿意重提旧事。

sentences.en: Rake out the cinders before you start a new fire.
sentences.cn: 在重新点火前先把煤渣耙出来.

sentences.en: Rake the leaves and heap them by the garage.
sentences.cn: 用耙子把叶子收在一起堆在汽车库旁边.

sentences.en: Rake the soil, press the seed into it, then cover it lightly.
sentences.cn: 将土耙松，把种子种在土里，然后轻轻地盖上土。

sentences.en: rake up old gossip.
sentences.cn: 揭露古老的传言

sentences.en: Rake up the trash on the ground.
sentences.cn: 把地上的废料耙在一起.

sentences.en: She got a rake - off of 5 per cent from the deal.
sentences.cn: 她从这笔交易中获得百分之五的 回扣.

sentences.en: The rake of the theater floor is a bit too steep.
sentences.cn: 剧场的地板斜度太大了一点.

sentences.en: The searchlight raked the open ground around the prison.
sentences.cn: 探照灯在监狱周围的空地上来回扫射。

sentences.en: the shop's &B{raking it in} now.
sentences.cn: 商店现在大笔盈利。

sentences.en: Then I tamp down the soil with the back of a rake.
sentences.cn: 然后我用耙子的背将土壤拍实。

words.tran_cn: 搜索；用耙子耙；掠过，擦过

phrases.tran_cn: （因自我放纵）逐渐堕落，走下坡路
(黑人英语)节省；吝啬；一毛不拔
迅速大量取得；大量地敛集（钱财）

phrases.phrase: rake over (old) coals (或 rake over the ashes)
phrases.tran_cn: (主英)重新忆起最易忘掉的往事
(非正式)（尤指轻易）捞进大笔钱
重新忆起最易忘掉的事情（或时光）
使暴露，使显出：使重现或公诸于众；公开

trans.tran_cn: 耙子，放荡的男人，舞台等的倾斜度，
trans.tran_en: a gardening tool with a row of metal teeth at the end of a long handle, used for making soil level, gathering up dead leaves etc

trans.tran_cn: 搜索；用耙子耙；掠过，擦过
trans.tran_en: to move a rake across a surface in order to make the soil level, gather dead leaves etc
to move a rake across a surface in order to make the soil level, gather dead leaves etc

trans.tran_cn: 搜索，以耙子耙平（泥土等），用耙子把…耙在一起，（翻阅旧记录、文件等以）搜寻事实等
